ProductID.title: ProductID
ProductID.description: This is the 18 or 15 digit Product record ID to find the Product for the QuoteLine. ProductID is identified using Product Name specified by the User.

Quantity.title: Quantity
Quantity.description: This is the Quantity for the QuoteLine to be created. Quantity will be specified by the User

QuoteID.title: QuoteID
QuoteID.description: This is the 18 or 15 digit Quote record ID. QuoteID will be identified based on the Quote specified by the User.
